alert.note: Alert for Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Meade and central Pennington Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles north of Opal to 3 miles east of Roubaix Lake. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Black Hawk, New Underwood, Union Center, Piedmont, Plainview, Elm Springs, Stoneville, Opal, Caputa, Fairpoint, Hayward and Red Owl. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 35 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
